info.name: Glamhub API - Production
info.description: Glamhub Backend API Collection for Production Server

request.description: Check API and database connection status

query.description: Filter by service type (makeup, hair, etc.)
Search by name, username, or description

request.description: Get all artists for explore/listing page. Public endpoint - no authentication required.
Get detailed artist profile with services, reviews, and stats. Public endpoint - no authentication required.
Check if artist is available on a specific date. Public endpoint - no authentication required.
Login with email. You can also use 'username' instead of 'email'. Provide either email OR username (not both).
Login with username. You can also use 'email' instead of 'username'. Provide either email OR username (not both).

body.raw:
{
  "firstName": "John",
  "lastName": "Updated",
  "username": "john_updated",
  "phone": "1111111111",
  "email": "john.updated@example.com",
  "avatar": "https://example.com/avatar.jpg",
  "city": "Belgrade, Serbia",
  "description": "Professional makeup artist with 5+ years of experience",
  "hasStudio": true,
  "address": "Street, 11, City"
}

request.description: Send a 4-digit OTP to the user's email for password reset. The OTP will be sent via email and expires in 10 minutes.
Reset password using the 4-digit OTP received via email. Requires email, OTP, and new password.
Get dashboard statistics: Total Revenue, Upcoming Appointments, Total Clients, Average Rating

query.description: Search by name, email, phone, or username

request.description: Get all clients for artist to select when creating appointment. Supports search and pagination.

query.description: pending, confirmed, completed, cancelled, rejected, or all
makeup, hair, nail, facial, bridal, party, other, or all

request.description: Update appointment status. Status: pending, confirmed, completed, cancelled, rejected

Artist manually creates an appointment. Either provide clientId OR client details (clientFirstName, clientLastName, clientEmail, clientPhone). Venue: artist_studio or client_venue. Payment method: pay_at_venue or pay_now. Provide either endTime or duration (in minutes).
Block a time slot. Duration format: '3 hours', '2 hours', etc.
Add vacation period. Blocks all appointments during this date range.
Get payment statistics: Available Balance, Total Earned, Payouts in Transit

query.description: pending, succeeded, failed, cancelled, in_transit, or all

request.description: Get reviews for artist. Public endpoint - use artistId query param or authenticate to get your own reviews.
Send a message to a client. Artist can only message clients for their own appointments.
Get all conversations (list of clients you've messaged).
Get all messages for a specific appointment conversation.
Mark all unread messages as read for a specific appointment.
Upload portfolio images. Use form-data with key 'images' and select multiple files.
Get portfolio images. If authenticated, returns your own portfolio. Or use artistId query param for public view.
Delete a portfolio image. Use the full image URL path from the upload response.
Create a new booking. If paymentMethod is 'pay_now', a paymentIntent will be returned for Stripe payment processing.

query.description: Filter by status: pending, confirmed, completed, cancelled, rejected, or all

request.description: Get all bookings for the authenticated client. Filter by status, pagination supported.
Get detailed information about a specific booking.
Get all reviews written by the authenticated client.
Create a new review for an artist. appointmentId is optional but recommended for verified reviews.
Get all favorited artists for the authenticated client. Includes artist details, ratings, and pricing.
Add an artist to favorites.
Remove an artist from favorites.
Process payment for a booking. Use the paymentIntentId from the booking creation response.
Check the status of a payment intent.
Request a refund for a paid booking.
Send a message to an artist. Client can only message artists for appointments they have created.
Get all conversations (list of artists you've messaged).
Get all messages for a specific appointment conversation.
Mark all unread messages as read for a specific appointment.
